titleStmt.title: The female ramblers· Or, The three buxome lasses of Northampton-shire containing their pleasant pastime at the Naggs Head, together with many intriegues that followed thereupon. Tune is, Let Cesar live long. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication from Wing.
Verse - "You young-men and lasses Id have ye take care,".
Reproduction of the original in Glasgow University Library.
